titleStmt.title: By His Excellency. Forasmuch as divers of this nation, notwithstanding their peaceable living and abiding at their severall habitations, within the quarters of the army, under my command; ...
titleStmt.author: Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

notesStmt.note: Title taken from caption and opening lines of text.
Type headpiece; Steele notation: Peace- Goods within.
Copy cropped with loss of type headpiece and imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
